name: Applicaster DI
description: The DI plugin allows, when enabled, to send the device country for Pipes2 endpoints that  require it. Its main purpose is to hide/show content on feed according to the user's country (Geo-Blocking).

custom_configuration_fields.label: Plugin enabled
custom_configuration_fields.label_tooltip: Disable plugin if you do not want to use plugin

custom_configuration_fields.label: Block UI until completed
custom_configuration_fields.label_tooltip: Disable if you don't want to block UI until process completions
